Agriculture Training Institute Manikganj () is a combined government technical college in Manikganj, a city in Bangladesh. It was established in 2018. It is situated in Dotara beside Dhaka-Aricha highway, Saturia Upazila, Manikganj. This is an Agricultural Diploma institute.
History
The institute is located in the center of saturia Upazila, was established in 2018. Initially the institute conducted only one shift. Honorable State Minister in charge of the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare, Mr. Alhaj Zahid Malek, MP inaugurated the Agricultural Training Institute, Saturia, Manikganj on 12.08.2018. As per the instructions of Bangladesh Technical Education Board, the academic activities of this institution started on 12.08.2018.
Facilities
a) Total land area: 7.16 acres.
b) There are 8 class rooms in the 4 (four) storey academic building with facilities for 800 students.
c) There are residential facilities for 156 students in the 4 (four) storey student hostel.
d) There are residential facilities for 56 students in the 3 (four) storey student hostel.
e) There are residential facilities for 30 farmers and farmers in the 2 (storey) farmer training center with training hall.
f) There are officers and staff dormitories for the accommodation of officers and employees.
Extracurricular activities
* Games and sports (mostly athletics, cricket, Badminton and football)
* Debating
* Math and language competitions.
* Picnic
* Social Development
